entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10.

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon except southwest 20 gusting to 40 over southwestern sections late in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
